# platform-game
@namespace
class SpriteKind:
    traffic = SpriteKind.create()
    FINISHER = SpriteKind.create()
    redflag2 = SpriteKind.create()

def on_a_pressed():
    if mySprite.vy == 0:
        # so that they could jump once they have touch the tiles
        mySprite.vy = -150
controller.A.on_event(ControllerButtonEvent.PRESSED, on_a_pressed)

# the height level that they could jump

def on_on_overlap(sprite, otherSprite):
    sprites.destroy(otherSprite)
    info.change_countdown_by(-2)
sprites.on_overlap(SpriteKind.player, SpriteKind.redflag2, on_on_overlap)

# if the car hit the red flag, the time is gonna be deducted by 2 seconds.

def on_overlap_tile(sprite2, location):
    game.game_over(False)
scene.on_overlap_tile(SpriteKind.player,
    assets.tile("""
        myTile1
    """),
    on_overlap_tile)

# kalau kena re

def on_on_overlap2(sprite4, otherSprite2):
    sprites.destroy(otherSprite2)
    if mySprite.y < mySprite3.y:
        info.change_countdown_by(2)
    else:
        # If the car hits on top of the human enemy, we get 2 second extra
        info.change_life_by(-1)
sprites.on_overlap(SpriteKind.player, SpriteKind.enemy, on_on_overlap2)

# id the car hits beside of the human enemy, we will lose one of our life.

def on_on_score():
    game.game_over(True)
info.on_score(100, on_on_score)

# Setting winning score which is a hundred

def on_on_overlap3(sprite3, otherSprite3):
    global mySprite3
    sprites.destroy(otherSprite3)
    mySprite3 = sprites.create(img("""
            . . 8 8 8 1 1 8 8 8 . . . . . . 
                    . . 8 8 8 1 1 8 8 8 . . 1 . . . 
                    . . . f d f d f d f . . . . . . 
                    . . . f d d d d d f . . . . . . 
                    . . . f d f f f d f . . . . . . 
                    . . . f d d d d d f . . . . . . 
                    . . . . f f f f f . . . . . . . 
                    . . . . . . f . . . . . . . . . 
                    . . . f f f f f f f . . . . . . 
                    . . . f f f f f f f . . . . . . 
                    . . . f f f f f f f . . . . . . 
                    . . . f f f f f f f . . . . . . 
                    . . . f f f f f f f . . . . . . 
                    . . . . f f f f f . . . . . . . 
                    . . . . f f f f f . . . . . . . 
                    . . . . f f f f f . . . . . . .
        """),
        SpriteKind.enemy)
    mySprite3.set_position(mySprite.x + randint(0, 200), mySprite.y + randint(0, 150))
    mySprite3.follow(mySprite, 100)
    info.start_countdown(10)
    info.change_score_by(10)
sprites.on_overlap(SpriteKind.player, SpriteKind.traffic, on_on_overlap3)

mySprite3: Sprite = None
REDFLAG: Sprite = None
TRAFFIC: Sprite = None
mySprite: Sprite = None

        ..............................

    """),
    SpriteKind.player)
# making the sprite or making the character of the game
controller.move_sprite(mySprite, 100, 0)
# adding the controller so that we can move the sprite with our keyboard
tiles.set_current_tilemap(tilemap("""
    level2
"""))
tiles.place_on_random_tile(mySprite, assets.tile("""
    myTile6
"""))
for value in tiles.get_tiles_by_type(assets.tile("""
    myTile6
""")):
    tiles.set_tile_at(value, assets.tile("""
        transparency16
    """))
mySprite.ay = 200
info.set_life(3)
info.start_countdown(10)
# so that sprite would always fall downwards
scene.camera_follow_sprite(mySprite)
for value2 in tiles.get_tiles_by_type(assets.tile("""
    myTile2
""")):
    TRAFFIC = sprites.create(img("""
            . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .

        transparency16

for value3 in tiles.get_tiles_by_type(assets.tile("""
    myTile7
